official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide for arbitration of certain disputes concerning airline-owned computer reservations systems, and for other purposes.
short_title: Airline Computer Reservations Systems Arbitration Act of 1987

summary.text: Airline Computer Reservations Systems Arbitration Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to direct the Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service to provide arbitration services for any participating air carrier or subscriber (ticket agent) which requests arbitration of any provision of a computer reservations system contract to which it is a party. Prescribes procedural guidelines for such arbitration.

titles.title: Airline Computer Reservations Systems Arbitration Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide for arbitration of certain disputes concerning airline-owned computer reservations systems, and for other purposes.
